issue.title: RGB channel swapping in ROS visualization tools

content.raw: You have to launch ROS to reproduce the problem right now, so it may take some digging in Gazebo to make a standalone regression test. I think it's possible that this is a gazebo-ros-pkgs compatibility problem, too, though I'm not sure what the message pipeline looks like there...
content.html: You have to launch ROS to reproduce the problem right now, so it may take some digging in Gazebo to make a standalone regression test. I think it's possible that this is a gazebo-ros-pkgs compatibility problem, too, though I'm not sure what the message pipeline looks like there...
